_comment3: player Chooses a Destiny: Path of Honor (White), Path of Wisdom (Blue), Path of Ambition (Black), Path of Battle (Red), Path of Might (Green)
_comment4: Each Prerelease pack contains one Hero card (respectively the General, the Savant, the Tyrant, the Warmonger, and the Provider), which isnâ€™t for use at the Prerelease. The pack also contains a playable Prerelease promo

querySet._comment: Early sets had 1/67 cards as foil, equating to 15/67 (~20%) chance a booster had a foil, and as of TSP it replaces a common.
